description: This file defines a custom Android View called ChessboardView used to render and interact with a chessboard UI component. It manages drawing the chessboard, highlighting moves and selected squares, and handling touch events for square taps.

classes.name: ChessboardView
classes.description: A custom Android View that displays a chessboard, handles user interactions, and visualizes game state.

methods.name: setPosition
methods.description: Sets the current chess position to be displayed.

methods.name: setSelectedSquare
methods.description: Marks a specific square as selected.

methods.name: setHighlightedMoves
methods.description: Highlights a list of possible move destinations.

methods.name: clearSelection
methods.description: Clears the current selection and move highlights.

methods.name: onDraw
methods.description: Handles rendering the chessboard, pieces, and highlights.

methods.name: onTouchEvent
methods.description: Processes touch input to detect square taps.
